titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain Federally owned land located in Story County, Iowa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, and Credit.

bill.summary: 2/17/2011--Introduced. Requires conveyance of approximately 44 acres of federally owned land administered by the Agricultural Research Service which comprises part of the National Animal Disease Center in the city of Ames, Iowa, to the city of Ames and its assigns.
